issue.title: Suspend CI builds for draft pull requests on GitHub
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5759](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5759). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
CI should be disabled for draft pull requests.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5759?focusedCommentId=16874302) by Francois Saint-Jacques (fsaintjacques):*
I don't agree with this one, often the CI on draft is used to ensure that the CI passes. You can use the `[skip travis]` token in your commit message to achieve the same see https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/ci/detect-changes.py#L223.
